entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:56 a.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.4Â°C

Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 9:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Temperature: 4.4°C

Humidity: 95 %

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 7 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers early this afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning then becoming north 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 7 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
